statements: SELECT * FROM wallet_aliases;
SELECT alias_label, wallet_address FROM wallet_aliases WHERE alias_id = '1234';
SELECT * FROM wallet_aliases WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT alias_label, wallet_address FROM wallet_aliases ORDER BY alias_label DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wallet_aliases;
SELECT * FROM wallet_aliases WHERE alias_label = 'Personal Savings' ORDER BY alias_id DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, alias_label FROM wallet_aliases WHERE alias_label LIKE '%Business%' ORDER BY wallet_address ASC;
SELECT alias_label, wallet_address FROM wallet_aliases WHERE wallet_address = '0x3a7PC90b9' ORDER BY alias_label ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_aliases WHERE wallet_address IN ('0xabc123', '0xdef456', '0xghi789') ORDER BY alias_id ASC;
SELECT wallet_address, alias_label FROM wallet_aliases WHERE alias_label IS NOT NULL ORDER BY alias_label DESC, wallet_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_address_aliases;
SELECT alias_label, wallet_address FROM wallet_address_aliases;
SELECT alias_id, alias_label, wallet_address FROM wallet_address_aliases WHERE alias_label = 'John Doe';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_address_aliases WHERE alias_label = 'Personal'
SELECT wallet_address, alias_label FROM wallet_address_aliases ORDER BY alias_label ASC
SELECT * FROM wallet_address_aliases WHERE alias_label LIKE '%Business%' ORDER BY alias_label DESC
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_history
SELECT sender_wallet_address, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM transaction_history GROUP BY sender_wallet_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM wallet_address_aliases;
SELECT alias_label, address FROM wallet_address_aliases WHERE alias_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT alias_label, alias_id FROM wallet_address_aliases ORDER BY alias_label DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT label_id, alias_label FROM alias_labels WHERE label_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM wallet_address_aliases;
SELECT address, alias_label FROM wallet_address_aliases WHERE alias_label='Personal';
SELECT alias_id, address, alias_label FROM wallet_address_aliases ORDER BY alias_id DESC;
SELECT alias_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history GROUP BY alias_id;
SELECT alias_label, label_description FROM alias_labels WHERE label_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY label_id;
SELECT id, alias_name, wallet_address FROM wallet_address_aliases;
SELECT label_name, wallet_address FROM wallet_address_labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_id, label_name FROM transaction_labels WHERE id < 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT label_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_labels GROUP BY label_name HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT alias_name, wallet_address FROM wallet_address_aliases WHERE alias_name LIKE '%bitcoin%' ORDER BY alias_name ASC;
SELECT id, label_name FROM transaction_labels WHERE label_name = 'fraudulent' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses;
SELECT alias, label FROM wallet_addresses WHERE id = 'f6596b57-7276-4807-9fa8-c7c25f461a3b';
SELECT id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT t.id, l.label FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_labels tl ON t.id = tl.transaction_id JOIN labels l ON tl.label_id = l.id;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, alias FROM wallet_addresses WHERE label IS NULL;
SELECT address FROM wallet_addresses WHERE id IN (SELECT sender_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000);
SELECT alias, label FROM wallet_addresses JOIN aliases ON wallet_addresses.alias = aliases.alias;
SELECT transactions.timestamp, labels.label FROM transactions JOIN transaction_labels ON transactions.id = transaction_labels.transaction_id JOIN labels ON transaction_labels.label_id = labels.id;
